price: 26 Il alla discrètement trouver les siens et revint avec un veau gras.
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجۡلٖ سَمِينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ahlihi fajāa biʿij'lin samīnin
